pages.text: To go into a Comatose you will first need to use a $(l:items/tourniquet)Tourniquet$(/l) on yourself and pass out$(br2)When you first wake up in a Comatose you will have an 'rgb shift' vision effect signalling that you are, in fact, in a Comatose. This vision effect can be disabled in the config

In the top left hand corner you will have a Comatose stage counter that, by default, has a 1/10,000 chance of incrementing every tick. The Comatose stage ui placement/visibility and coma stage incrementation can be modified in the config$(br2)When this counter reaches 10/10 you will wake up from your Comatose and you will return to normal

The Comatose also has it's own unique fluid type called $(l:level/comasote)Comasote$(/l) (not to be confused with the actual dimension name)$(br2)The Comatose dimension is still very much a work in progress and lots of stuff is yet to be added to it
